channel.title: Bridding || Updates Weekly || Active Wilderness || Custom minigames
channel.description:
www.Bridding.pw
It's a spawn pk server based server with some items restricted that require player killing points, minigame points or some other kind of points to get them. You start at Edgeville and you cant set your stats by clicking the stat- There are also premade pking sets that can be spawned in the quest tab to save time, our policy is log and start killing, don't waste time getting your stuff!. Commands: [code]getid itemname - gets the id of an item. item id quantity - spawns an item. veng - gives vengeance runes. home - teleports you home. bank - opens up your bank. char - takes you to a makeover mage to set your appearance. barrage - spawns barrage runes. tb - spawns tb runes. empty - empties your inventory. yell. players - show the players online skull - skulls you for 10 minutes. changepassword newpass - changes the password.
[/code] A Custom minigame [youtube]http://youtu.be/LT0ll2bL20Q[/youtube] [youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hHT6xxQKNuo[/youtube] Some Activity in the Wilderness [youtube]http://youtu.be/9XVedISgpFc.[/youtube] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/e3b468e9_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/9d8c3107_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/5f63810f_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/4e6ff36f_o.png[/img] Some Gamblers, points and item gamblers. [img]http://i.share.pho.to/05a2a976_o.png[/img] [img]http://i.share.pho.to/35d5f535_o.png[/img]

item.title: Bridding || Updates Weekly || Active Wilderness || Custom minigames
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:



Some updates.

I’m currently on a PvP Zombie minigame, there’s currently a lobby, and the city has been decided. For now there’s only the lobby then it takes you to the city, the screen fades like when you are in the giant mole, and you need a lantern to see better.
Barricades from castle wars have also been implemented “Only” For that area while a game is running, and they disappear after 20 ticks.

Read full topic
item.source: Bridding || Updates Weekly || Active Wilderness || Custom minigames

item.description:
@strucker wrote:

www.Bridding.pw

It’s a spawn pk server based server with some items restricted that require player killing points, minigame points or some other kind of points to get them.
You start at Edgeville and you cant set your stats by clicking the stat-
There are also premade pking sets that can be spawned in the quest tab to save time, our policy is log and start killing, don’t waste time getting your stuff!.
Commands:

[code]getid itemname - gets the id of an item.
item id quantity - spawns an item.
veng - gives vengeance runes.
home - teleports you home.
bank - opens up your bank.
char - takes you to a makeover mage to set your appearance.
barrage - spawns barrage runes.
tb - spawns tb runes.
empty - empties your inventory.
yell.
players - show the players online
skull - skulls you for 10 minutes.
changepassword newpass - changes the password.

[/code]
A Custom minigame
